content.text: is designed to summarize billing data by gas rate code and billing period from the

table. It aggregates various financial metrics such as total due, credit balance, gas charges, arrears, and miscellaneous charges, along with consumption metrics like CCF and Therms. The view also provides a count of the number of accounts billed. It includes two main parts: one that groups by specific gas rate codes and another that aggregates data across all gas rate codes.
